verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old שְׁתֵּ֨ים <WH8147> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> sha-Nah years מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh Manasseh בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> ve-ma-le-Cho, when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim fifty וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <WH2568> ve-cha-Mesh and five שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim; in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> ve-Shem name אִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> im-Mo And his mother's חֶפְצִי־ chef-tzi- בָֽהּ׃ <WH2657> Vah. [was] Hephzibah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> ha-Ra' [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD כְּתֽוֹעֲבֹת֙ <WH8441> ke-to-'a-Vot after the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <WH3423> ho-Rish cast out יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּ֗שָׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shov, again וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven For he built up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבָּמ֔וֹת <WH1116> hab-ba-Mot, the high places אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אִבַּ֖ד <WH6> 'ib-Bad had destroyed חִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> chiz-ki-Ya-hu which Hezekiah אָבִ֑יו <WH1> 'a-Viv; his father וַיָּ֨קֶם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kem and he reared up מִזְבְּחֹ֜ת <WH4196> miz-be-Chot altars לַבַּ֗עַל <WH1168> lab-Ba-'al, for Baal וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as and made אֲשֵׁרָה֙ <WH842> 'a-she-Rah a grove כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֗ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah, as did אַחְאָב֙ <WH256> 'ach-'Av Ahab מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <WH7812> vai-yish-Ta-chu and worshipped לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> tze-Va all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of heaven וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> vai-ya-'a-Vod and served אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> 'o-Tam.

וּבָנָ֥ה <WH1129> u-va-Nah And he built מִזְבְּחֹ֖ת <WH4196> miz-be-Chot altars בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher of which אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of which the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim In Jerusalem אָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> 'a-Sim will I put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמִֽי׃ <WH8034> she-Mi. my name

וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven And he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <WH4196> miz-be-Chot altars לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol for all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> tze-Va for all the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven בִּשְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> bish-Tei in the two חַצְר֥וֹת <WH2691> chatz-Rot courts בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְהֶעֱבִ֤יר <WH5674> ve-he-'e-Vir pass אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנוֹ֙ <WH1121> be-No And he made his son בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh, through the fire וְעוֹנֵ֣ן <WH6049> ve-'o-Nen and observed times וְנִחֵ֔שׁ <WH5172> ve-ni-Chesh, and used enchantments וְעָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> ve-'A-sah and dealt א֖וֹב <WH178> ov with familiar spirits וְיִדְּעֹנִ֑ים <WH3049> ve-yid-de-'o-Nim; and wizards הִרְבָּ֗ה <WH7235> hir-Bah, much לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot he wrought הָרַ֛ע <WH7451> ha-Ra' wickedness בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לְהַכְעִֽיס׃ <WH3707> le-hach-'Is. to provoke [him] to anger

וַיָּ֕שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem And he set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פֶּ֥סֶל <WH6459> Pe-sel a graven image הָאֲשֵׁרָ֖ה <WH842> ha-'a-she-Rah of the grove אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher of which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah; that he had made בַּבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> bab-Ba-yit, in the house אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָמַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of which the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> da-Vid to David וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh and to Solomon בְנ֔וֹ <WH1121> ve-No, his son בַּבַּ֨יִת <WH1004> bab-Ba-yit In this house הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> u-vi-ru-sha-Lim, and in Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בָּחַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH977> ba-Char-ti which I have chosen מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> mik-Kol all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> shiv-Tei out of all tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> 'a-Sim will I put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> she-Mi my name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> le-'o-Lam. for ever

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not אֹסִ֗יף <WH3254> 'o-Sif, any more לְהָנִיד֙ <WH5110> le-ha-Nid move רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> Re-gel Neither will I make the feet יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah, out of the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti which I gave לַֽאֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> la-'a-vo-Tam; their fathers רַ֣ק׀ <WH7535> rak but אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> yish-me-Ru only if they will observe לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot, to do כְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוִּיתִ֔ים <WH6680> tziv-vi-Tim, according to all that I have commanded וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> u-le-chol- to all הַ֨תּוֹרָ֔ה <WH8451> hat-to-Rah, them and according to all the law אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam עַבְדִּ֥י <WH5650> 'av-Di that my servant מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses

וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> ve-Lo did not שָׁמֵ֑עוּ <WH8085> sha-Me-'u; But they hearkened וַיַּתְעֵ֤ם <WH8582> vai-yat-'Em seduced מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh not and Manasseh לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot them to do אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָרָ֔ע <WH7451> ha-Ra', more evil מִן־ <WH4480> min- more הַ֨גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, than did the nations אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הִשְׁמִ֣יד <WH8045> hish-Mid destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- by עֲבָדָ֥יו <WH5650> 'a-va-Dav his servants הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <WH5030> han-ne-vi-'Im the prophets לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

יַעַן֩ <WH3282> ya-'An because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who עָשָׂ֜ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah hath done מְנַשֶּׁ֤ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh Because Manasseh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah הַתֹּעֵב֣וֹת <WH8441> hat-to-'e-Vot these abominations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, these הֵרַ֕ע <WH7489> he-Ra' [and] hath done wickedly מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> mik-Kol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su did הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri above all that the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav; which [were] before וַיַּחֲטִ֥א <WH2398> vai-ya-cha-Ti also to sin גַֽם־ <WH1571> gam- also אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah him and hath made Judah בְּגִלּוּלָֽיו׃ <WH1544> be-gil-lu-Lav. with his idols פ Peh

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הִנְנִי֙ <WH2005> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֣יא <WH935> me-Vi Behold I [am] bringing רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah, [such] evil עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim upon Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> vi-hu-Dah; and Judah אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher that כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- whoever; שֹׁמְעָיו sho-me-'av כשֹׁ֣מְעָ֔הּ <WH8085> sho-me-'Ah, listen קתִּצַּ֖לְנָה <WH6750> titz-Tzal-nah shall tingle שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> she-Tei of it both אָזְנָֽיו׃ <WH241> 'a-ze-Nav. his ears

וְנָטִ֣יתִי <WH5186> ve-na-Ti-ti And I will stretch עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, over Jerusalem אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et קָ֣ו <WH6957> kav the line שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> sho-me-Ron, of Samaria וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִשְׁקֹ֖לֶת <WH4949> mish-Ko-let and the plummet בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit of the house אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> 'ach-'Av; of Ahab וּמָחִ֨יתִי <WH4229> u-ma-Chi-ti and I will wipe אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ka-'a-Sher- one יִמְחֶ֤ה <WH4229> yim-Cheh as [a man] wipeth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַצַּלַּ֙חַת֙ <WH6747> hatz-tzal-La-chat a dish מָחָ֔ה <WH4229> ma-Chah, wiping וְהָפַ֖ךְ <WH2015> ve-ha-Fach [it] and turning עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over פָּנֶֽיהָ׃ <WH6440> pa-Nei-ha. [it] upside down

וְנָטַשְׁתִּ֗י <WH5203> ve-na-tash-Ti, And I will forsake אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> she-'e-Rit the remnant נַחֲלָתִ֔י <WH5159> na-cha-la-Ti, of mine inheritance וּנְתַתִּ֖ים <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Tim and deliver בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> be-Yad them into the hand אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֑ם <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Hem; of their enemies וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu will become לְבַ֛ז <WH957> le-Vaz and they shall become a prey וְלִמְשִׁסָּ֖ה <WH4933> ve-lim-shis-Sah and a spoil לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all אֹיְבֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Hem. to all their enemies

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an, because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher they עָשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su Because they have done אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָרַע֙ <WH7451> ha-Ra' [that which was] evil בְּעֵינַ֔י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nai, in my sight וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu been מַכְעִסִ֖ים <WH3707> mach-'i-Sim me to anger אֹתִ֑י <WH853> 'o-Ti; מִן־ <WH4480> min- and have provoked הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, since the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after יָצְא֤וּ <WH3318> ya-tze-'U came forth אֲבוֹתָם֙ <WH1> a-vo-Tam their fathers מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> ve-'Ad against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom even unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. to this

וְגַם֩ <WH1571> ve-Gam Moreover דָּ֨ם <WH1818> dam blood נָקִ֜י <WH5355> na-Ki innocent שָׁפַ֤ךְ <WH8210> sha-Fach shed מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh Moreover Manasseh הַרְבֵּ֣ה <WH7235> har-Beh much מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> me-'Od, very עַ֛ד <WH5704> 'ad with אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which מִלֵּ֥א <WH4390> mil-Le till he had filled אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem פֶּ֣ה <WH6310> peh from one end לָפֶ֑ה <WH6310> la-Peh; to another לְבַ֤ד <WH905> le-Vad alone מֵֽחַטָּאתוֹ֙ <WH2403> me-chat-ta-To beside his sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הֶחֱטִ֣יא <WH2398> he-che-Ti to sin אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, wherewith he made Judah לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot in doing הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> ha-Ra' [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְיֶ֨תֶר <WH3499> ve-Ye-ter Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֤י <WH1697> div-Rei of the acts מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah, and all that he did וְחַטָּאת֖וֹ <WH2403> ve-chat-ta-To and his sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which חָטָ֑א <WH2398> cha-Ta; that he sinned הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> ha-lo- not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> hem like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> ke-tu-Vim, [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> Se-fer in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> div-Rei of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> le-mal-Chei of the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah.
